subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: France, shaken by a series of heavy defeats by southern hemisphere teams last year, put those losses behind it as it defeated Scotland, 34-21, to start its defense of the Six Nations rugby championship.
snippet: France, shaken by a series of heavy defeats by southern hemisphere teams last year, put those losses behind it as it defeated Scotland, 34-21, to start its defense of the Six Nations rugby championship.
